interests.text: I enjoy solving tough logical or math problems.
I like designing interfaces or visuals that look clean and usable.
I like explaining ideas to others through talks, demos, or presentations.
I enjoy building apps or websites from scratch and shipping features.
I am curious to experiment, research, and test new tech ideas.
I like organizing processes and making systems efficient and reliable.
I enjoy working directly with users or customers to understand needs.
I like securing systems, finding vulnerabilities, and fixing risks.
I enjoy working with hardware, devices, sensors, or robots.
I like planning strategy, roadmaps, and prioritizing what to build.
I enjoy writing docs, blogs, guides, or content.
I like marketing and growth ideas: campaigns, SEO, social media.

personality.text: I feel energized when I brainstorm with a group.
I prefer deep, focused solo work for long stretches.
I easily start conversations and enjoy networking events.
I need quiet time to recharge after social activities.
I trust concrete facts, data, and step-by-step methods.
I like imagining new possibilities and big-picture ideas.
I prefer hands-on experience over theory to learn something.
I enjoy spotting patterns and thinking about future impact.
When deciding, I focus on logic, pros/cons, and objective criteria.
When deciding, I consider people's feelings and values.
I enjoy debates that challenge assumptions, even if direct.
I aim to keep harmony in the team and avoid conflicts.
I like clear plans, checklists, and hitting deadlines.
I prefer flexible schedules and keeping options open.
I plan tasks ahead and dislike last-minute changes.
I'm comfortable adapting quickly when plans change.
